group_1.textLeft: …We've arrived…

group_1.textRight: Yes…

group_1.textLeft: This is the cafe Ikumi where worked…

group_1.textRight: [chara:102001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
N-no, uh, t-table for two…

group_1.textLeft: Kagome, you can't say that!@Normal people can't see me…!

group_1.textRight: Ah!

group_1.textLeft: The two of you…uh, who is the other…?

group_1.textRight: …Th-this doll! My partner…!

group_1.textLeft: How cute… What a mysterious girl…

group_1.textRight: S-so, a table, please…

group_1.textLeft: Certainly.

group_1.textRight: …I panicked…@This kind of place makes me so nervous…

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Kagome…
It seems a bit noisy here…

group_1.textRight: I heard that there will be a memorial event@for Ikumi next week…
They seem to be preparing for it while carrying@on with their regular business…

group_1.textLeft: I see…
So then the customers also know about Ikumi@passing away…

group_1.textRight: It was announced by the cafe's social media@account yesterday, with her family's consent.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case…this commotion is…

group_1.textRight: Yes, they must be trying to come to terms@with Ikumi's death.
Everyone is.
And, it may be cruel, but…
I came to this cafe today to document@this scene…!

group_1.textLeft: Ikumin…why…!

group_1.textRight: It's too sudden…

group_1.textLeft: Hey, how did Ikumin die?
Haven't you asked the manager or something?
This cafe has been around for quite a while.

group_1.textRight: I asked…but they didn't give me an answer…

group_1.textLeft: It wasn't suicide…right…?

group_1.textRight: I want to think so, but…

group_1.textLeft: For a while, she was taking a lot of days off…
Even after she returned, she didn't perform@on stage…
She had her usual smile, but it looked like she@was forcing it…
If only we had noticed sooner…!

group_1.textRight: Stop it, don't overthink it.
Besides, even if we had noticed, what could@we have done?
It wasn't suicide.

group_1.textLeft: I want…to believe that, too…

group_1.textRight: A Magical Girl's death can leave a significant@amount of unease among ordinary people…
I'm sure that no one can accept it…

group_1.textLeft: Ikumi held the position of head maid, too…@So it's even more complicated.
(As for me…)
(I've been invisible for a long time, and there's@probably no one who remembers me…)
(If that's the case, then I can relax for a bit…)
